Today in Caithness, Dunnet Bay is lighting up with a solid 3ft @11s WNW swell and light 8 mph S winds, making for clean conditions. Tomorrow, it drops to 2ft @7s NW with fresh 15 mph NNE winds, so it might be a bit choppy. The day after, expect a fun 4ft @10s NNW swell with light 7 mph WSW winds, perfect for a surf session at spots like Point of Ness and Thurso East. Best: today.
